DeathClock:ScytheStrike.NAME: Scythe Strike
DeathClock:ScytheStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and inflicts !M! stack(s) of deathclock:Summon_Death

DeathClock:DodgeDeath.NAME: Dodge Death
DeathClock:DodgeDeath.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and reduces !M! stack(s) of deathclock:Summon_Death

DeathClock:FutureProblem.NAME: Future Problem
DeathClock:FutureProblem.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block but you gain !M! stack(s) of deathclock:Summon_Death

DeathClock:NotMyProblem.NAME: Not My Problem
DeathClock:NotMyProblem.DESCRIPTION: Inflict an enemy with deathclock:Summon_Death equal to the amount of stack(s) you have
DeathClock:NotMyProblem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Inflict all enemies with deathclock:Summon_Death equal to the amount of stack(s) you have

DeathClock:NewLife.NAME: New Life
DeathClock:NewLife.DESCRIPTION: Resets your deathclock:Summon_Death, but gain !B! block for every stack removed

DeathClock:SevernTrumpets.NAME: Severn Trumpets
DeathClock:SevernTrumpets.DESCRIPTION: Increases the amount of damage deathclock:Summon_Death deals by !M!
DeathClock:SevernTrumpets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Increases the amount of damage deathclock:Summon_Death deals by !M!

DeathClock:Satanic.NAME: Satanic
DeathClock:Satanic.DESCRIPTION: For every stack of deathclock:Summon_Death you have, deal !D! damage
DeathClock:Satanic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage, but gain !M! stacks of deathclock:Summon_Death
